Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • Module
      • Course

  • public class Course
extends Module
    Course is child class of Module class. As every year will have the same module but different lecturer teaching different students, it is used for specific elaborate the changing information.
    Since:
    2018-10-1
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    4 Friends and Yoong Wei

      Course(java.lang.String moduleId, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String staffId, int year, int semester)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Course

        public Course(java.lang.String moduleId,
              java.lang.String description,
              java.lang.String staffId,
              int year,
              int semester)
        To create a course we the following information: 1.module id 2.description 3.staffId - who is the person in charge 4.year- which year 5.sem- which sem
        Parameters:
        moduleId - unique id for a course.
        description - description.
        staffId - pic.
        year - which year.
        semester - which sem.
